description: Dan Saxon’s debut on Lucas Entertainment has been explosive, and he’s already on the rise to being a hugely popular gay porn model among the Lucas Men. It’s no surprise, as we all admire his fresh Californian surfer-dude handsomeness. It’s this that both Edji Da Silva and Jonathan Miranda were lusting after while they were all hanging out on the beaches of Fire Island. Edji invites both Jonathan and Dan back to his room at the Belvedere, where he unleashes his sexual aggression on both guys!
title: Dan Saxon And Edji Da Silva Double-Team Jonathan Miranda
